author: A_Brickset_user
title: Great pieces for a Belville Fan
review: I picked this up used on E-Bay. It has sleeping bags and a bed sized for the adult figures. It also has a lot of the thick large Belville base plates. They are great for the floors of upper stories when building your own house. The tables are also nice, however on used sets don't count on the stickers looking as good.
